publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-151 Donald Gorrie: Selling Alcohol to a Drunken Person—That the Parliament expresses concern that no prosecutions were brought in 2002-03 under section 76 of the Licensing (Scotland) Act 1976 for selling alcoholic liquor to a drunken person and believes that it is essential that full use is made of existing laws such as this in the campaign against violence, disorder and alcohol abuse.

S2M-151 Donald Gorrie: Selling Alcohol to a Drunken Person—That the Parliament expresses concern that no prosecutions were brought in 2002-03 under section 76 of the Licensing (Scotland) Act 1976 for selling alcoholic liquor to a drunken person and believes that it is essential that full use is made of existing laws such as this in the campaign against violence, disorder and alcohol abuse.
S2M-151 Selling Alcohol to a Drunken Person (lodged on 16 June 2003) Nora Radcliffe*, Robert Brown*, Shiona Baird*, Karen Gillon*, Brian Adam*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-151 Selling Alcohol to a Drunken Person (lodged on 16 June 2003) Alex Neil*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-151 Selling Alcohol to a Drunken Person (lodged on 16 June 2003) John Swinburne*
